hero.body: KICKS CREW believe that the CREW always comes first. Each MIRROR CREW shine as one CREW, fully embodying spirit of KICKS CREW. KICKS CREW x MIRROR debuts globally, the collection houses memorabilia items for the MIRROR community. After all, WE ALL ARE - ONE CREW.
behindTheScenes.header: BEHIND THE SCENES WITH KICKS CREW x MIRROR
behindTheScenes.description: The most memorable moments happen behind the scenes. Look out for interviews, featurettes and deleted/alternate scenes!
footer.search.label: FIND YOUR PAIR
